meanings.definition: Panels or sections of wood used for covering walls.
meanings.sent1: The panelings in the living room give it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more panelings to finish the wall project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the panelings but slipped comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright panelings, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The panelings, with their intricate designs, added elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: The act of installing panels on a surface.
meanings.sent1: His job involves the panelings of walls in new buildings.
meanings.sent2: The panelings of the ceiling were done with great precision.
meanings.sent3: The panelings of the door were installed upside down by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The panelings of the stage transformed it into a magical forest.
meanings.sent5: The panelings of the room echoed with each hammer strike during installation.
